mutants.code:
def calculate_overall_power(test_cases):
    MOD = 1000000008
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        N = case[0]
        strengths = case[1]
        if N < 2:
            results.append(0)
            continue
        strengths.sort(reverse=True)
        max_strength = strengths[0]
        sum_diff = 0
        temp1 = 0
        for i in range(1, N):
            sum_diff += max_strength - strengths[i]
        temp1 = sum_diff
        for i in range(1, N - 1):
            temp = temp1 - (N - i) * (strengths[i - 1] - strengths[i])
            sum_diff += temp
            temp1 = temp
        sum_diff = sum_diff % MOD
        overall_power = sum_diff * max_strength % MOD
        results.append(overall_power)
    return results

        for i in range(1, N - 1):
            temp = temp1 - (N + i) * (strengths[i - 1] - strengths[i])
            sum_diff += temp
            temp1 = temp
        sum_diff = sum_diff % MOD
        overall_power = sum_diff * max_strength % MOD
        results.append(overall_power)
    return results

def calculate_overall_power(test_cases):
    MOD = 1000000007
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        N = case[0]
        strengths = case[1]
        if N < 2:
            results.append(0)
            continue
        strengths.sort(reverse=True)
        max_strength = strengths[0]
        sum_diff = 0
        temp1 = 0
        for i in range(1, N):
            sum_diff += max_strength - strengths[i]
        temp1 = sum_diff
        for i in range(1, N - 1):
            temp = temp1 - N * i * (strengths[i - 1] - strengths[i])
            sum_diff += temp
            temp1 = temp
        sum_diff = sum_diff % MOD
        overall_power = sum_diff * max_strength % MOD
        results.append(overall_power)
    return results

def calculate_overall_power(test_cases):
    MOD = 1000000007
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        N = case[0]

        if N < 2:
            results.append(0)
